name: Midnight Comet
description: A champion racehorse with remarkable speed and agility. Has won 12 major races in the past 3 years.

name: Silver Wind
description: Known for endurance and elegance. Has completed three 100-mile races with outstanding times.

name: Desert Storm
description: Powerful sprinter with exceptional acceleration. Undefeated in quarter-mile races.

name: Whisper's Legacy
description: Graceful dressage performer with incredible discipline and poise. Winner of multiple international competitions.

name: Thunder's Echo
description: Majestic and powerful with distinctive high-stepping gait. Star of several film productions.

name: Golden Sunrise
description: Young rising star with exceptional jumping ability. Recently began competitive circuit with promising results.

name: Misty Mountain
description: Versatile performer excelling in both trail riding and show competitions. Known for calm temperament.

name: Crimson Tide
description: Veteran competitor with exceptional stamina. Has mentored younger horses and participates in therapeutic riding programs.

name: Winter Frost
description: Classical dressage specialist trained in the highest levels of performance. Known for precise movements.

name: Wildfire
description: Rescued from the wild three years ago, now competing successfully in endurance races. Symbol of adaptability and spirit.
